Lowell.Brown\u2013Maynard House:
The Brown–Maynard House is a historic house at 84 Tenth Street in Lowell, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a two-story wood frame structure, with a low-pitch hip roof topped by a cupola, clapboard siding, and a porch that wraps around the front and side of the house. The cupola is distinguished by tripled narrow round-arch windows on each side, and a bracketed roofline matching that of the main roof.
